section_a.beneficiaries: BE George Garrett Archive Project C.I.C. activities will provide benefit to local, diverse communities through its work in celebrating, preserving and disseminating the work of the Liverpool writer, merchant seaman and social activist, George Garrett. This will be done through educational courses and developing creative and cultural projects to schools (pupils and teachers), Further and Higher Education students; as well as the general population to benefit the community of the Liverpool City Region as well as raising awareness of Garrett's work nationally and internationally
